name: CODEQUEST 0
description:
You have been assigned a MISSION by your MASTER, the wise TECHSAGE.

He has dubbed a powerful ROGUE PROGRAMMER the CODELORD.

The CODELORD has generated a SYNTHETIC LAND that is overtaking the WORLD.

The TECHSAGE has assigned YOU to stop the ADVANCE of this THREAT.

CODEQUEST 0 was Ussar Datamancy's first complete game, an executable created by the head programmer as a final project for her first year in a 3-year Computer Science course and later worked on further.

It is a simple text-based combat RPG, featuring caricatures of a handful of real Computer Science students as enemies.

Resources and info here.
